idiri wasara kihipaya thula apa kamathi wuwath nathath rajapaksha rejimaya wisin asahaya balayak godanagagannawa atha.namuth eya abhiyogayata lakkaranawa nam abhiyogayata lakkala haki parshawa kihipayak thibe.ejapaya mehidi nishkriya athara jawipe saha demala samajaya mehidi thiranathmaka wanu athayi sithiya haka.aanduwa thula nowalakwiya haki bala gatumak athi wanu athayi sithimata ida thibena athara me nisa abhyantharikawa eyada rajapaksha wisin palanaya kara gatha yuthu abhiyogayaki.jawipe saha demala samajaya athara nirogi awabodhayak godanonagenne nam nawatha thamata erehi ewani wardhanayan rajapaksha rejimaya wisin pahasuwen yatapath karanu atha.
